description: City of New Orleans squares, 'Square' - A portion of property with specific street or other designated boundaries and a given alpha/numeric identification.  ESRI shapefile format, GIS software required for viewing geometry (http://www.esri.com/software/arcgis/arcreader/).  Tabular date (DBF), included as part of the shapefile, are viewable in Excel.  Update: weekly

metadata.attribution: City of New Orleans - Department of Information Technology & Innovation

name: NOLA Squares
